author: BOL
title: Maduro anuncia avanço da Venezuela em sistema antidrones - Notícias - BOL
text:
Maduro anuncia avanço da Venezuela em sistema antidrones 26/09/2024 19h06
O presidente venezuelano, Nicolás Maduro, ordenou nesta quinta-feira (26) uma "readequação" do aparato de defesa do país com um sistema antidrones em áreas estratégicas, em meio a denúncias de planos para derrubá-lo.
Maduro se reuniu com o comando da Força Armada, que lhe jurou lealdade após a sua reeleição, denunciada pela oposição como uma fraude.
"Estamos avançando rapidamente na capacidade de drones para a defesa nacional e devemos ter uma defesa antidrones em todos os alvos vitais: aeroportos, portos, etc.. É muito importante", disse o presidente, durante um ato pelo 19º aniversário do Comando Estratégico Operacional (CEO), responsável pela gestão das tropas.
"É necessário fazer uma readequação, uma reengenharia dos processos de inteligência e contrainteligência estratégica, militar e policial do Estado venezuelano, para adaptá-lo às novas circunstâncias do século XXI, principalmente às circunstâncias da Venezuela", acrescentou Maduro, que costuma denunciar com frequência conspirações de que é vítima, que atribui à oposição, com a cooperação dos Estados Unidos.
"Reiteramos toda a nossa lealdade", disse o ministro da Defesa, general Vladimir Padrino López, a Maduro. O presidente insistitiu na revisão de "todos os equipamentos que tenham sido comprados", após ataques no Líbano com explosivos implantados em dispositivos usados pelo Hezbollah.
"Segurança máxima", pediu Maduro, que já havia ordenado aos funcionários do governo e a apoiadores que não aceitassem como presente de Natal equipamentos eletrônicos.
mbj/jt/mr/lb
© Agence France-Presse

author: Get News
title: The digital currency platform Enet Crypto Center Limited successfully obtained the U.S. Fincen MSB license, legalizing and regularizing transactions. | dailytimesleader.com | Serving West Point & Clay County Since 1867
text:
On December 20th, after submitting proof of MSB registration completion, Enet Crypto Center Limited (hereinafter referred to as Enet) officially obtained the U.S. Fincen MSB license on November 15. This marks a further step in Enet's compliance journey, allowing it to legally conduct currency exchange business in the United States, further expanding its international development space. This establishes a solid foundation for serving global users and enables Enet to provide users with safer, compliant, efficient, and convenient digital economic transaction services
Since 2018, the U.S. Department of Treasury and the Securities and Exchange Commission have repeatedly emphasized that MSBs (Money Services Businesses) include virtual currency exchanges and their managers. The regulated entities are businesses and companies related to financial services. The regulatory scope includes international remittances, foreign exchange, currency trading, ICO issuance, and management of prepaid projects. Operating digital asset-related business within the United States requires a license. Hence, Enet’s possession of the license grants it legal status in the U.S., distinguishing it from other irregular platforms.
Enet Exchange has always sought higher-level and broader development. As a global leader in decentralized exchanges, it is committed to breaking national boundaries and achieving global integration. Based on Enet's public blockchain technology, it aims to realize scenario implementations in various fields, including capital, digital asset management, digital asset payment, blockchain charity, blockchain gaming, blockchain entertainment, blockchain shopping, and blockchain community games, thereby creating a complete decentralized digital asset ecosystem.
Holding a license is of great significance for current exchanges. Obtaining official permission from the respective countries reflects the strength and credibility of the exchange. For most exchanges, a license also acts as a natural barrier for selection. For users, Enet's compliant operation under regulatory conditions is a major advantage, meaning their investments will receive legal protection. Under official permission, Enet strictly meets local regulatory requirements and user protection regulations.
Enet will continue to advance its compliance and globalization development, providing safe and convenient digital asset transaction services to more global users. It also calls on other platforms to join the regular development path, contributing to the industry's progress and hoping to achieve industry compliance consensus.

author: Saints Editor
title: Saint Marcellinus, Priest, and Saint Peter, Exorcist
text:
Saints Marcellinus, a priest, and Peter, an exorcist, are celebrated together for their unwavering faith and courage in the face of persecution. Their lives, marked by service to God and ultimate martyrdom, offer profound lessons for contemporary Catholics.
Saint Marcellinus and Saint Peter lived during the early 4th century, a time of intense persecution of Christians under the Roman Emperor Diocletian. Marcellinus served as a priest, known for his devout faith and dedication to his pastoral duties. Peter was an exorcist, entrusted with the ministry of casting out demons and aiding those oppressed by evil spirits. Their shared commitment to the Christian faith led them to work closely together in ministering to the spiritual needs of the Christian community.
Their arrest came amid Diocletian’s harsh measures against Christians. Refusing to renounce their faith, Marcellinus and Peter were subjected to severe torture. Despite the pain and suffering, they remained steadfast, encouraging each other and fellow Christians to hold fast to their beliefs.
Impressed by their fortitude, their jailer, Artemius, and his family converted to Christianity. This miraculous conversion further fueled the resolve of Marcellinus and Peter. Eventually, they were sentenced to death. According to tradition, they were led to a secluded forest to prevent their bodies from becoming relics for the faithful. There, they were beheaded and buried secretly. Their burial site was later revealed, leading to the veneration of their relics.
Lessons
- Lesson 1: Unwavering Faith in Adversity: The steadfastness of Marcellinus and Peter in the face of brutal persecution teaches us the importance of remaining true to our faith, regardless of the challenges we may encounter. Their courage reminds us that our faith should be a source of strength and conviction, especially during difficult times.
- Lesson 2: The Power of Witnessing: Through their courageous witness, Marcellinus and Peter inspired conversions, demonstrating the profound impact of living a life devoted to Christ. Their example encourages us to be bold in our witness to the faith, understanding that our actions and steadfastness can inspire others to seek and embrace the truth of the Gospel.
Prayer
O glorious Saints Marcellinus and Peter, who bore witness to Christ through your unwavering faith and courageous martyrdom, intercede for us that we may remain steadfast in our faith amidst the trials and challenges of life. Grant us the courage to witness boldly to the Gospel and to inspire others through our example. May your lives of service and sacrifice remind us of the power of faith and the importance of fidelity to God. Through your intercession, may we grow in holiness and trust in God’s grace. Amen.
Other Saints We Remember Today
St. Erasmus (303), Bishop and Martyr, invoked against stomach ailments
